    • checkAndSwap

      public static int checkAndSwap​(Shape[] shape, int start, int end)
      This method is used check the array elements and sort them in descending order by swaping them.
      Parameters:
      shape - Shape polygon
      start - first element index
      end - last element index
      Returns:
      i+1 the pivot to be in next recursion of sorter function in quick sort.

      c - comparator to use in the sorting
